reviewDetails.comment: I saw Dr. Lakdawala for an emergency. She was kind, gentle and listened carefully to me. It was soothing. After thorough questions on my current meds, she explained what the next steps were. She was excellent!
Dr Lakdawala is very kind and thorough. Highly recommend.
She was very nice and helpful. The medication she gave me really worked. Her examination was thorough.
Anything she had to say, google knows as well. Pessimistic and unconcerned with patients
Very thorough and patient.
She was very nice

reviewDetails.comment:
Prompt, clear and explained how the process would work 
It was a satisfactory experience
Dr Gurvits is excellent. He is thorough, he cares about his patients, and he went above and beyond to make sure I received the care and support I needed.

Dr. Gurvits is the BEST doctor I have ever seen. He listens. He explains. He doesn't condescend. He remembers you and your medical history. Dr. Gurvits could teach a seminar on how to be the doctor that everyone deserves.
Dr. Gurvits is a friendly and thorough doctor who explains everything every step of the way.

I had a terrible experience. I not only waited 2 hours but when I received bloodwork with some inconsistencies, I called the doctor/office multiple times to speak with him. I left messages on the portal and heard nothing. when i finally spoke with the office 6 business days later, the nurse who spoke to me was so extremely rude and hung up on me.
Dr. Gurvits is an excellent GI doctor. Would recommend. Listens to patients.
He had good customer service and he appeared know his medicine

reviewDetails.comment: One of the best. Intelligent, explains issues clearly and succinctly, personal and professional.

U have been seeing Dr. Panatelli for many years now and his care, concern and treatment is too notch. His knowledge and treatment options for my condition is extensive and my out comes continue to be positive.

Dr Panarelli is friendly and professional. I originally met him while participating in a clinical study on glaucoma as a healthy volunteer at NYU. I decided at the time to become a patient of his going forward. The NYU office is spotless, and very well organized. Always a pleasure to go there.

I was told by an employee that he is a very good glaucoma specialist and I believe because he has a lot of patients and he is always overbooked. He is also, very friendly, communicative and is interested in his patients' health.

Dr. Panarelli is one of the top eye doctors in the country, very personable, explains everything so the patient understands. Always provides a game plan that not only takes care of the medical issue, but also for the long term results. Highly recommend if anyone has any eye related issues.
He truly took his time in explaining exam results and testing, making sure I understood all available follow up care options
